name: Crabzilla
description:
CRABZILLA - Get big, get crabby & destroy the city!

You play as a mutant crab that has been captured by the humans and shrunk down, but you've escaped! 

Eat your way through the vermin of the city and then to the humans and their vehciles themsevles to grow back to your old size!

Once you're big enough, eat your way through the city and absorb it's materials to grow stronger. Each time you grow, try eating objects!

And look out for golden objects, eating these will bestow new powers!

Created for KenneyJam2022 - all art assets are by Kennedys (the programming/design & music are by me). 
Info on the Jam: https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2022

Controls:

WASD - movement

Arrow keys - attack in each direction

F4 - Full screen on/off.

M - turn music on/off.
